title: Ubuntu, Wayland, screenshare not working
body:
**Describe the bug**
I am using the Teams for Linux client on Ubuntu 24.04.1 and I cannot get the screenshare function to work on Wayland. 

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go on "Meet now" from Calendar
2. Start meeting
3. Click on screenshare
4. See error
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e5bb2bf1-5b60-4355-b0b9-d5985c656947)


**Expected behavior**
I expected the behavior to being able to share my screen. If I run Teams through Firefox I am able to share my screen without issues.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Ubuntu 24.04.1
 - Installation package: snap I think (?)
 - Version: 1415/24102001318.
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4d06eb29-6242-4f58-8017-3c71193ce45a)


**Debug**
When possible, please run the application from the terminal using `--webDebug` and try to reproduce the error.

The provide in this section the output from both the terminal and the browser debug console.

```bash
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```
